message:
Like GHOST IN SHELL S.A.C 2nd, everybody told me it's 9 out of 10 masterpiece,but I could only enjoy maybe 7 out of it, so how I am supposed to score it?
Basically, is BANGUMI a website for recording your personal ACGN track or a seriously rank database requiring objective view of point?
title: How to score the masterpiece you don't quite understand
